argumentText:
ARGUMENT
y

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | dprdff.w | |- W = { h e. X_ i e. I ( S ` i ) | h finSupp .0. } |
| 2 |  | dprdff.1 | |- ( ph -> G dom DProd S ) |
| 3 |  | dprdff.2 | |- ( ph -> dom S = I ) |
| 4 |  | dprdwd.3 | |- ( ( ph /\ x e. I ) -> A e. ( S ` x ) ) |
| 5 |  | dprdwd.4 | |- ( ph -> ( x e. I |-> A ) finSupp .0. ) |
| 6 | 4 | #P_ralrimiva | |- ( ph -> A. x e. I A e. ( S ` x ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( x e. I |-> A ) = ( x e. I |-> A ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_fnmpt | |- ( A. x e. I A e. ( S ` x ) -> ( x e. I |-> A ) Fn I ) |
| 9 | 6, 8 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> ( x e. I |-> A ) Fn I ) |
| 10 |  | #P_simpr | |- ( ( ph /\ x e. I ) -> x e. I ) |
| 11 | 7 | #P_fvmpt2 | |- ( ( x e. I /\ A e. ( S ` x ) ) -> ( ( x e. I |-> A ) ` x ) = A ) |
| 12 | 10, 4, 11 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ( ph /\ x e. I ) -> ( ( x e. I |-> A ) ` x ) = A ) |
| 13 | 12, 4 | #P_eqeltrd | |- ( ( ph /\ x e. I ) -> ( ( x e. I |-> A ) ` x ) e. ( S ` x ) ) |
| 14 | 13 | #P_ralrimiva | |- ( ph -> A. x e. I ( ( x e. I |-> A ) ` x ) e. ( S ` x ) ) |
| 15 |  | #P_nfv | |- F/ y ( ( x e. I |-> A ) ` x ) e. ( S ` x ) |
| 16 |  | #P_nffvmpt1 | |- F/_ x ( ( x e. I |-> A ) ` y ) |
| 17 | 16 | #P_nfel1 | |- F/ x ( ( x e. I |-> A ) ` y ) e. ( S ` y ) |
| 18 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( x = y -> ( ( x e. I |-> A ) ` x ) = ( ( x e. I |-> A ) ` y ) ) |
| 19 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( x = y -> ( S ` x ) = ( S ` y ) ) |
| 20 | 18, 19 | #P_eleq12d | |- ( x = y -> ( ( ( x e. I |-> A ) ` x ) e. ( S ` x ) <-> ( ( x e. I |-> A ) ` y ) e. ( S ` y ) ) ) |
| 21 | 15, 17, 20 | #P_cbvral | |- ( A. x e. I ( ( x e. I |-> A ) ` x ) e. ( S ` x ) <-> A. y e. I ( ( x e. I |-> A ) ` y ) e. ( S ` y ) ) |
| 22 | 14, 21 | #P_sylib | |- ( ph -> A. y e. I ( ( x e. I |-> A ) ` y ) e. ( S ` y ) ) |
| 23 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_dprdw | |- ( ph -> ( ( x e. I |-> A ) e. W <-> ( ( x e. I |-> A ) Fn I /\ A. y e. I ( ( x e. I |-> A ) ` y ) e. ( S ` y ) /\ ( x e. I |-> A ) finSupp .0. ) ) ) |
| 24 | 9, 22, 5, 23 | #P_mpbir3and | |- ( ph -> ( x e. I |-> A ) e. W ) |
\
 A mapping being a finitely supported function in the family ` S ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Apr-2016.)  (Revised by AV, 11-Jul-2019.)  Obsolete version of ~ dprdwd as of 30-Mar-2020. (New usage is discouraged.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.)
